title: Task Mangement Website
description: A Task Management website based on 80% Js which utilizes local data storage. Learned the importance of Js in this internet era and how to use them to make eye-catching websites.

title: Disney+, Zomato Clones
description: Imitation of Landing pages of the above-mentioned websites. Learned how different websites work and most importantly about the UI & UX of those websites which is the most crucial element of any website.

title: Handwriting learning Model & Music Preference Model (ML & DL)
description: Handwriting analysis is done in MATLAB. which most programmers feel is difficult to program. Learned about different types of models and trained them.Then tried a music suggestion model with the knowledge of the previous model, in which used Deep Learning to create an ANN.

title: Agrobots Console Application
description: A console-based application in which users sign in. sign-up, and employee sign in which mimics an Agrobot purchasing site, with data stored using MySQL and connected to the JAVA application. Learned the use of connectivity and combinations of languages.

title: Smart Mirror (IoT)
description: Shows weather information and personal notes in a mirror which is simulated in a GUI with real-time data
